ygData.subject: Re: I hope it stays a secret...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well one of my guild members offered me 50 pp for the pole, he is a lvl 40 pala. And the reason he offered me this is because he fishs a lot and finds it
ygData.messageBody:
Well one of my guild members offered me 50 pp for the pole, he is a lvl 40 pala. And the reason he offered me this is because he fishs a lot and finds it annoying when the poles snap. He has heard a rumor that collapsable poles dont break. Anyway i regretted informing him, that i cant make one :(

Wes Lobdell,
Note: I'm not a Mac person, but you have to admit, the following is funny+ACEAIQ- :) And if you don't +ACI-get+ACI- it, then I guess the media hasn't soaked it for all its worth yet after all...
Quote: +ACI-Macintosh -- we might not get everything right, but
atleast we knew the century was going to end.+ACI-
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time

From: MadGrizzle MadGrizzle+AEA-worldnet.att.net
To: EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 10:32 AM
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AF0- I hope it stays a secret...


From: MadGrizzle MadGrizzle+AEA-worldnet.att.net

I think the fishing pole itself is a bit useless. So it's lighter and can
be placed in a small bag, not too thrilling.
The real value comes from using the pole to make the spyglasses, unlimited
charges of telescopic sight.


At 07:17 AM 08/11/1999 -0700, you wrote:
+AD4APg-From: +ACI-Dave Duncan+ACI- deduncan19+AEA-hotmail.com
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg-I guess I'm just a little curious as to why we think the collapsable
+AD4APg-fishing pole will be so profitable? Is it the pole itself? Or the
+AD4APg-potential to make the spyglass? Just a little curious.
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg-Litre Hosen,
